data.title: Modern UI
data.description: Sleek and clean user interface allows you to focus on the task at hand. Allows you to choose between light and dark modes based on your personal preference.

data.title: Free
data.description: This is an open community initiative and it's absolutely free for personal and commercial purposes. You can create as many number of projects and teams as you need without limit.

data.title: Advanced
data.description: Support for Kanban and Scrum methodologies. You can use story points or time estimates. We are continously working towards improving the application and adding new features.
